post.text:
Join me LIVE in Sterling Heights, MI!

comment.author: Shaw
comment.text: Heroin addicts and homeless living alongside our countries riding and jogging trails. We need law and order and our country back. We are dying on the vine.

replies.author: Kathleen
replies.text: And how is that going to happen under Trump. She he talks a lot and says it's going to change but he never says how
